definitions.definition: To hurt , usually by introducing poison or a sharp point , or both.

examples: A mosquito stung me on the arm.
definitions.label_groups: transitive , of an insect or arachnid

definitions.definition: To hurt , to be in pain (physically or emotionally).
examples: My eyes are sting ing from the chopped onions.
My hand stings after knocking on the door so long.
Still, it stung when a slightly older acquaintance asked me why I couldn't do any better.

definitions.definition: To cause harm or pain to.
examples: I thought I could park in front of the hotel, but they stung me for five pounds!

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To hurt , usually by introducing poison or a sharp point , or both.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , of an insect or arachnid ) To puncture with the stinger .
( intransitive , sometimes figurative ) To hurt , to be in pain (physically or emotionally).
( figurative ) To cause harm or pain to.
